txt.en: '[placeholder]! Your brethren failed us. Lugazag, our tower here in the west, has fallen to the hands of a târk! We must make our way to the tower and slaughter the forces standing watch.\n\n'Do this, and I might think more of you than a maggot, ripe for smashing. Fail me, and I will see you posted to the slave pits of Carn Dûm!'

'Well, well! You might not be a worthless bag of dung after all. Done a good job at Lugazag and slaughtered the târk!\n\n'I also heard that a host of the târks and their allies ran off into the wood and escaped. A victory...perhaps, but shoddy work, you maggot!'

'You best be back to tell me you've followed your orders, sluggard! Else I'll throttle you and put you on a cart bound for the muck beneath Mordirith's throne!\n\n'Get out there and slaughter the Captain-General at Lugazag!'
Captain-General Harvestgain is the leader of the Free Peoples at Lugazag.
Defeat Captain-General Harvestgain and claim Lugazag. You must not be defeated when the Captain-General falls.
Captain-General Harvestgain, a târk, leads the forces within Lugazag.\n\nSoldier Súmtharb made it clear that the only objective is to strike down the enemy's leader.
Súmtharb is at Gramsfoot.\n\nAfter gathering allies, you sieged Lugazag and drove the enemy from within.
